title: Bug 103963: No error message displayed when there is no data for a series
OB: When there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a chart. 2. Set the data definition for the chart. 3. Select a column that does not have any data.
